name: Angostura Rum Punch
preparation:
There are a couple of factors that can turn a typical punch into something special. First, you need to choose the right mix of juices. Most important, you need to mix them with a delicious premium rum. It’s safe to say that Angostura Rum Punch easily meets that criteria.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled.

Strain into a Hurricane glass over fresh ice.

Garnish with a brandied cherry.
